fullDescription.intro: This node lets you handle unconnected CDK molecules. This is necessary because some algorithms won't work with unconnected structures. You have either the choice to completely remove the rows that contain unconnected molecules, or to remove all molecule parts except the biggest one.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the molecular structure
Removes all rows completely that contain a molecule with multiple fragments
Removes all fragments except the biggest from unconnected molecules
Adds a collection column that contains all fragments a molecule consists of

ports.outPort: As input but without unconnected molecules
